channel.title: ▓▒░Duel Kingdom - 100% Duel Based Server░▒▓
channel.description:
[b]I had an idea to create a server that was more original than all the other pvp servers and wildy servers out there. and now ive released it. Thanks to baselm for the base and i hope you enjoy it.[/b]
[size=20pt][font=Algerian][b]Download: http://uppit.com/v/Z4AU8UMS Download Client: http://uppit.com/v/AFLCJK14[/b][/font][/size]
[size=20pt][font=Algerian][b]Features[/b][/font][/size]
Full [b]Dueling[/b]
Full [b]Staking[/b]
100% [b]duel points, win points and lose points.[/b]
Modified dueling [b]to make it less glitchy[/b], although there are still some glitches.
Added some [b]dueling rules[/b] and made them work.
::pvp checks your duel points, wins and losses.
::getpvp checks another persons duel points wins and losses.
[size=20pt][font=Algerian][b]Pictures[/b][/font][/size]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2gt4y2g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/11tsvt1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/23lh4s3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/dxmedw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/nqvf2o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/10mlquh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/262pstw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/jfc0nd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/ngf8y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/sdfh35.png[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2ai3tj5.png[/img]
